animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm often yellow when I'm little.
💦 I love to play in puddles.

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase string. What am I?
I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 My milk is used to make cheese and ice cream.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat lettuce too.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse but I have stripes

animal.question: I am a big cat with a loud roar and a mane around my neck. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am called the king of the jungle

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees

animal.question: I have a pouch and hop. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 I carry my baby in a pouch.

ocean.question: I wave to you when you visit the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can play in me near the sand.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water, but salty.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have lots of arms to hug with.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in many pretty colors.
🧱 I live in a coral home.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and sing songs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🎤 I communicate with whistles and clicks.
💙 I am very smart and playful.

ocean.question: I'm a huge creature that lives in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth!
🐳 I breathe through a hole on my back.
🌊 I eat tiny shrimp called krill.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and snap with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I live in the sand near the beach.
♨️ Some people like to eat me!

ocean.question: I am small and hide in a shell, when you get close. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ I might not be there when the wave comes.

ocean.question: I am the home of many fish, and am very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in the warm parts of the ocean.
🧱 I am made of many tiny creatures.
🪸 I am in danger from pollution.
